DOC.brief_summary: An open label study to determine the efficacy and safety of SPARC1507
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects with advanced Biliary tract carcinoma meeting the eligibility criteria will be randomized in this study.
DOC.criteria: Evidence of advanced/metastatic biliary tract cancer Male or female ≥ 18 years old Participants must have measurable disease according to RECIST ECOG performance status ≤ 1 Known hypersensitivity to trial treatments, or their excipients Prior history of treatment with any taxane therapy Cardiovascular disorders as per Investigator's discretion The subject has received radiation therapy
